ygData.subject: Chords of Dissonance
ygData.msgSnippet: Supposedly this spell gets more power as you advance, does anyone know to what extent?  Initally in the lower levels 1-6 I found this spell to be a great way
ygData.messageBody:
Supposedly this spell gets more power as you advance, does anyone know to
what extent? Initally in the lower levels 1-6 I found this spell to be a
great way to kill myself, either in attracting that ever popular guard you
forgot patrolled your area of the incredible "there he is that guy, everyone
get him!" attraction feature of this song. But lately at 9th I've had alot
of fun practicing my String skill and nuking lvl 1 characters in the newbie
areas of freeport. But I'm curious just how much damage does this song
actually do anyways? I've been using it more and more in the desert taking
spiders and such. Makes for a great helper if you think you're not gonna
make it out alive. Sure you have to be sure nothing else is around
otherwise you'll be double/tripple teamed by creatures but even still I
finally feel like its a useful spell. Also in a party does this spell also
do damage to members in your party as well?

Gediprime, of Xegony
